lyrics.stanza: Jesus, meek and gentle, Son of God most High, Pitying, loving Savior, Hear Thy children's cry.
Pardon our offences, Loose our captive chains, Break down every idol Which our soul detains.
Give us holy freedom, Fill our heart with grace; Lead us on our journey, Till we win the race.
Jesus, meek and gentle, Son of God most high, Pitying, loving Savior, Hear Thy children's cry.
